Reviews.Title: “Good for conferences and stopovers”
Reviews.Author: batravn
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights connection wedding hotel typical conference hotel placed near dadeland mall close restaurants newly build district access us1 turnpike easy book hotel easy access florida keys everglades beaches miami beach reception staff pleasant professional valet service quick size clean beds special respect decor free wifi plus book middle 3 4 star rating 4 elevators waiting time ordinary rate rate 3

Reviews.Title: “Service makes up for some shortcomings”
Reviews.Author: Adam K
Reviews.Content: spent nights marriott dadeland attending meeting marriotts solid hotels lobby bar fairly upscale expect modern plush top hotel bed mattress hard mentioned management excellent pool gym front desk extremely pleasant bought cuban dish craving restaurant directed serve dish service beyond expectation keeping perfect hotel comfortable bed

Reviews.Title: “GREAT location... best beds and pillows in the business”
Reviews.Author: Angie S
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel ten times times past 8 love mall expressway business traveler convenient forgotten items mention closest store enterance cheese cake factory cant wrong hotel facility business pleasure comfortable oversized beds pillows snooze sessions feel welcomed guest front desk quick friendly accomodating ive issue internet connection chains mention pool deck 7th floor nice outdoor space gym provides nice view pool youre

Reviews.Title: “rooms a little tired but ok otherwise”
Reviews.Author: heb999
Reviews.Content: location shop nearby mall commuter train downtown miami little dated ie style tv spacious marriots stayed bathroom bed hotel fine business recommend vacation

Reviews.Title: “Okay....”
Reviews.Author: MatthewD713
Reviews.Content: stayed overnight business trip hotel outdated service marriotts courtyards sub categories actually nicer hotels bathrooms outdated bed standard view ill stay else time id suggest front desk helpful pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel - Be Prepared to Pay for Everything....”
Reviews.Author: gerimsw
Reviews.Content: husband weekend enjoyed price hotelthe valet service nice arrived minibar sensored drinkers bring own water soda little complicated refrigerator own drinks charged check dispute accomodating surprise cost daily internet usage approximately 950 day usually hotels provide free internet service guess im staying incidentals included wonderful experience

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Stay”

Reviews.Content: nice stay nice clean flat panel tvs service resturant bar friendly shopping nearby resturants hotel valet park 17 day

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE OF ROOM CHOICE”

Reviews.Content: whilst staff hotel invariably charming experience depends stay frankly marriott ashamed themselves lower floors simply redecorated refurbed rough guess 1980s remind norm scale corporate chain hotel late 90s drab curtains type majority hotels moved excuse stayed motels refurbished comfortable wellappointed nicely decorated hotels roof

Reviews.Title: “Great stay as usual”
Reviews.Author: pamal100
Reviews.Content: stay hotel choice visit univ miami service nice comfortable beds stay nice surroundings feel lesser bargain extra hotel stay cities quick travel stay dependable marriott courtyards miami enjoy ourselves am staying month grocery store dadeland mall restaurants shops join aaa dollars discount hotel rental cars attractions cant beat price

Reviews.Title: “OK Hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel convenient airport business meeting found average compared normal standards marriott hotels clean found bed unconfortable bathroom layout akward toilet shower inside sink outside bathroom return hotel
